name: Leveraging your Virtual 1:1 Meetings (Notion Template)
description: Virtual 1:1 meetings can sometimes feel like a total time-suck — like you’re just checking a box or worse, bothering your manager with stuff they don’t really need.This Notion template helps you flip that script. It’s made to help you plan and run 1:1s that actually matter — meetings that feel productive and that help you move forward.Use it to: Set clear agendas so every meeting has a purpose Keep your notes organized so nothing important slips through the cracks Track action items so you both

creator.name: Be Happy Remote by Sam Roberts

features: Set clear agendas so every meeting has a purpose; Keep your notes organized so nothing important slips through the cracks; Track action items so you both know what’s next; Use proven agenda templates for virtual coffees, first meetings, and regular check-ins to make these conversations easier and more effective
